title: Random thoughts/TIL
text:
This is a collection of random thoughts and things I’ve learned. This often reflects a work in progress, and I may update posts as I learn more.












TIL: Decoding the Secrets of Language Model Decoding



Today I Learned


AI Explorations


Tech Musings



Just learned something cool about how language models like ChatGPT interpret our words. Let’s dive in!



Farrukh Nauman


Nov 10, 2023

title: Farrukh Nauman
text:
I am Farrukh Nauman, PhD in Physics from University of Rochester, and currently working as an AI Researcher at RISE Research Institutes of Sweden AB. My research interests span a broad range from Applied AI domains like sustainable fashion to computational fluid dynamics applied to astrophysical flows.


Update (Dec. 18th, 2023):
I am currently porting my old homepage (last updated in 2019) to this new one. Please bear with me while I do that. I might remove or update a couple of things in the process.

title: Automating second-hand fashion
text:
In recent years, the fashion industry has been undergoing a significant transformation, with sustainability and circular economy becoming key priorities. This blog post explores how Artificial Intelligence (AI) is playing a crucial role in driving these changes, particularly in the second-hand fashion sector.




Briefly discuss the environmental impact of the fashion industry.
Highlight the growing demand for sustainable fashion practices.





Overview of AI applications in fashion.
Specific examples of AI use in design, manufacturing, or customer experience.







Explain how AI is used in sorting and grading second-hand clothing.
Discuss the benefits of automating these processes.





Describe AI tools for inventory management in second-hand stores.
The impact on efficiency and customer satisfaction.






Share real-world examples or case studies where AI has been successfully implemented in the second-hand fashion sector.





Discuss the challenges faced in integrating AI into second-hand fashion.
Offer insights into the future of AI in this field.





Summarize the key points discussed in the blog.
Reflect on the potential long-term impact of AI on sustainable fashion practices.





List any references or further reading materials here.

title: TIL: Decoding the Secrets of Language Model Decoding
text:
Hey there! Today I stumbled upon something fascinating about how language models work. Have you ever wondered how AI like ChatGPT understands and responds to our queries? Let’s get into the world of decoding!




Explain what decoding is in a simple and engaging manner.
Maybe throw in a fun analogy or two!





Briefly introduce various decoding algorithms with easy-to-understand examples.





Share why understanding these algorithms is cool and important in layman’s terms.





Sum up your key takeaways in a friendly and conversational tone.





End with a light-hearted closing thought or a teaser for what you might explore next.
